markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Boost Eidolon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1045)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 100 feet

**Target** your  eidolon 
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks. Your eidolon gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with its [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. If your eidolon's Strikes deal more than one weapon damage die, the status bonus increases to 2 per weapon damage die, to a maximum of +8 with four weapon damage dice.
name: Boost Eidolon

summary_markdown: You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks.
text: Boost Eidolon Single Action Source Secrets of Magic pg. 144 2.0 Cast verbal Range 100 feet Target your eidolon Duration 1 round --- You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and boost the power of your eidolon's attacks. Your eidolon gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with its unarmed attacks. If your eidolon's Strikes deal more than one weapon damage die, the status bonus increases to 2 per weapon damage die, to a maximum of +8 with four weapon damage dice.
